title: Walking paths, Close to Bainbridge Ferry, Full-size washer and dryer
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1130 Sq.
Welcome to Island Homestead Apartments For Rent in Bainbridge Island, Washington where you will find newly remodeled homes set within exceptionally landscaped grounds.
Our pet friendly property sits on five acres of land with territorial and greenbelt views.
The surroundings are serene, well-maintained and the apartment buildings are set far enough apart for privacy.
Hop the Seattle/Bainbridge Ferry, just four blocks away and enjoy a 30-minute hassle-free commute to Seattle.
Island Homestead is within walking distance to downtown Bainbridge and within close proximity to the historic Lynwood Theater and The Tree House Cafe.
Walk or ride your bicycle around the quaint harbor setting and browse the friendly local businesses.
Stop by for a tour today and discover what Island life is all about!

Large living room with mantled fireplace, Generously-sized two bedroom apartments, Newly renovated interiors, Fully equipped kitchen, Extra storage off deck, Full-size washer and dryer, Disability access, Patio/balcony, Separate dining room

Resident lounge with kitchen, Resident fireplace, Walking paths, Walk to boutiques and cafes, Close to Bainbridge Ferry, Heated pool and spa with sundeck, Smoke-free community, Hi-speed internet available, Fully-equipped fitness studio
Our homes accommodate two pets per home.
Use this link for more info:
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
